alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Franklin; Union (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 7:13PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL FRANKLIN COUNTY IN SOUTHEASTERN INDIANA, UNION AND SOUTHEASTERN FAYETTE COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL INDIANA THROUGH 745 PM EDT... At 712 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Liberty, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Connersville, Liberty, West College Corner, Salem, Blooming Grove, Brownsville, College Corner, Dunlapsville, Alquina, Whitewater State Park, Charlottesville, Billingsville, Cottage Grove, Clifton, Kitchel, Philomath, Everton, Springersville and Witts Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
